body: tickling is an official torture method. i would have enjoyed this more if it was realistic.
Damn it god, thanks for lothing
My God, I loved it, especially the fact of seeing Tanya so humiliated in that state of seduction.
Tickling probably falls under cruel and unusual punishment so therefore a rule is still being broken.
Thank you, Unimpressive Chaoslord for your thoughtful and observant input. Why not blog it?

I had been looking forward to seeing this translated. If there's any complain to be raised here is how they call Tanya "Tanya the Evil". That's never uttered in the novels save for the title, and even then that was the US translator's idea. If anything they should refer to her as "Devil of the Rhine"; that's how the Empire's enemies know her.
